title: problem with damage numbers
body: so i have been having issues with not being able to see the damage numbers for magic damage, true damage, critical damage i can only see the red numbers for physical damage. i have looked at all the setting in interface and restored defaults as well as uninstalling and reinstalling the game nothing works help!!!

replies.body:
Your settings files that are saved server-side could be corrupt and cause this issue. I'd recommend taking the following steps in order to reset these files. First, **log into the League Client** then navigate to your config folder, which should be in this directory:

>**C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config**

Once in this folder, delete the following files:
**- input.ini
- PersistedSettings.json**

After deleting those files, hop into a custom match and confirm if your combat text is displaying properly now. Let me know if this worked!
did all the steps still only seeing physical damage numbers

Can you send me a screenshot of your settings showing the other damage types have been enabled? Hit **F12** to take a screenshot, then grab the screenshot from the folder (**C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Screenshots**) and then upload it to whatever image hosting site online you'd like and link me.
